categories: Category:Jedi Consulars of the Jedi Order
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Karu was a female Nautolan Jedi Master who resided on the ruined planet of Taris. At one point in the year 3643 BBY, she trained a rising Jedi Consular who would eventually achieve the rank of Barsen'thor.
Karu first appeared in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic for Republic allied classes. In the game, she serves as a trainer for the Jedi Consular class.
